name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 62: Alone Time

content.html:
Dear Internet, On this weeks show, we talk about internet dating, using toilet time to avoid your significant other, and getting fired over lemon flavored malt beverage. Stay gold, XOXO We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
